component.title: MVEL
component.description: Transforms the message using a MVEL template.
component.label: transformation,script

resourceUri.description: Path to the resource or a reference to lookup a bean in the Registry to use as the resource

contentCache.description: Sets whether to use resource content cache or not

encoding.description: Character encoding of the resource content.

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
